extension.summary: THE MAINTENANCE TOOL Y'All WILL EVER NEED!!!
extension.description: Does all the Maintenance needed for a smooth kodi with out all the fluff. Features Auto Cache delete at every start up, notifies you when package and thumbs get full (Sizes are changable) cuts down on your devices read/writes on the ROM. Also has tons of Backup/Restore Options and a Speed test, plus other great features!! THX goes to surfacingx and TDB for the code used
